page.title: 01LOWER WHITLEY & SHINFIELD
page.content: This area can be roughly divided into the area around Lower Whitley which is mostly residential & heavily populated & the area around Shinfield village which is primarily agricultural land. Much of the agricultural land has very recently been lost as the result of the construction of the M4 motorway which runs right across the area from west to east;& also the development of a vast private housing development in the East of the area. Within the area are a number of very important agricultural research establishments whose findings are made available to many countries in the world.There is also the European Weather Centre which supplies information worldwide.It is interesting to note that what happens in this small area could be of world_wide importance.
